transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good afternoon sir. Sir Alok baat kar raha hun India Mart office se.
Customer: Raat ko kal ek call aaya tha 11 baje ke kareeb miss call tha.
Executive: Maine to call nahi kiya hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi aapke isi number se aaya tha last mein 075 hai.
Customer: Yes ye aapke number hai.
Executive: Ye to aapne phone kiya hoga by chance tab maine repeat kiya hoga.
Customer: Ha maine maine to sir kiya tha kyunki aapne bataya tha na ki 76 number pe jo sir hai unse baat karu 76 wale.
Executive: Wo phone nahi utha rahe hai sir maine aapke number pe phone kiya.
Customer: Six wale pe nahi karna tha.
Executive: Kispe call karna hai sir bataiye.
Customer: Bataya maine.
Executive: Sir aapka aapke account ka renewal hai is mahine sir. Aapko pata hai sir.
Customer: Haan bilkul ji bilkul pata hai sir.
Executive: Service bhi bilkul sir aapko di gayi hai apna ne aapko acha business karwaya hai.
Customer: Main karwata hu sir isi isi isi hafte mein karwata hu sir. Isi hafte.
Executive: Sir is hafte hafta bitne wala hai sir ye to.
Customer: Main karwata hu sir. Sir mujhe bhi yaad hai sir.
Executive: Hai na. Nahi nahi masla ye hai sir ki hame na aapke business mein kuch service mein kuch kaam karna hota hai sir. Aap thoda waqt dete hai to kaam kar paate hai nahi to sir renewal ekdam seedha process as it is hum jaisa hota hai waisa hi usko fir live kar dete hai. Kuch extra nahi kar paate sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To sir aapki baat kuch extra business ke related.
Customer: Nahi wo aap kya hai aap kya hai waha pe yaha pe.
Executive: Main sir Ratna Ratna ki company handle karti hai na unka manager baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Ji. Bahut sari cheeze thi pichle aapne dedh do saal mein to jyada kuch kiya nahi itna jyada. Main aapko realize de deta hun aapko. Kyunki pata nahi kitne mere sath aapke do saal mein kitne manager badal gaye. Unhone har daily ek chothe koi na koi naya manager aa jata tha nayi kahani batane ke liye.
Executive: To thoda sa customer bhi na hum log bhi thoda sa aapko pata hai hesitate ho jate hai bilkul. Ki nayi kahaniyan sun sun kar ke. Kyunki jo work liya hua hai usi work pe hum kaam nahi kar pa rahe hai to nayi kahaniyon ka koi banta nahi hai na sir.
Customer: Koi example denge sir nayi kahaniyon jaise bata rahe hai aap kya aisa face karna pada.
Executive: Nahi ab kaiyo aadmi aa chuke main kiski kiski baat yaad rakhunga.
Customer: Nahi nahi baat nahi matlab unhone kuch bataya hoga aapko.
Executive: Baki nahi renewal to renewal main aapko karwaunga hi. Baki aap se puchta hun ki kya best ho sakta hai aur kya cheeze hai. Aap se karunga kaam.
Executive: Bilkul sir karna hai ye to kuch acha service ke bare mein aapko bataya gaya India Mart ke isse upar ki.
Customer: Sir bataya gaya hai Ratna madam ne to bataya tha.
Executive: Ji ji sir na ho sir ki baad mein aapko kyunki ek client ka complaint aaya tha mere paas kal ek August mein sir renewal tha bol raha hai ki sir mere ye competitor hai to sir competitor ke bare mein pucha unhone. Maine bataya ki aap badi service use karte hai. Ek hai sir mere paas example de raha hun. Guru kripa karke company hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To unka kal phone aaya mere paas ki sir aise complaint kiya unhone business nahi aa raha hai. To fir unhone pucha mujhse ki company hai meri Mahakaleshwar karke bataiye wo kya use kar rahi hai usko business aa raha hai daily truck pe truck maal ja raha hai. Maine bataya unko ki sir 2022 se sir wo use kar rahe hai ye service. To keh raha hai mujhe bataya nahi gaya. Jab maine renewal karaya to mujhe bataya hi nahi gaya ki mere competitor kya use kar rahe hai. To main chahta hun sir ki ek bar aapko agar pata hai bataya gaya to bahut achchi baat hai nahi to aap ek bar video meeting pe discuss kar lete. Ki mere aapke bhi competitor honge sir sab jan rahe honge.
Customer: Main aapko batau main aapka good name sir.
Executive: Alok Pandey sir.
Customer: Alok ji main aap se na baat karunga actually jo sare decision hamare making hai na sir wo hamare manager hai. Thik hai ji to unke sath baith kar ke abhi kya hai na do teen din se unka schedule jo hai bahar out ka chal raha hai isliye thoda sa wo busy chal rahe hai. Kyunki hamari non mein aa gaya hai ki hame deliver karana hai to isko ek ki do din mein hame final bhi karna hai. To aap sari lekar ke sari cheeze karke isko final karenge. Thoda time dena padega bas chahta hun.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Thoda samay dena padega four to five days only.
Executive: Four five days mat lijiye sir isko sir aaj ke mushkil se sir 8 tarikh tak last aapko karwa dijiye sir. Main char din ka time teen din aaj ko leke char din ho jayenge sir.
Customer: Koi nahi main kal karwata hun kal baithta hun kal batata hun aapko hai na kal baith ke baat karta hun.
Executive: Ji ji ha main keh raha tha aapne jo phone kiya tha na to wo ek complaint khul jati hai sir India Mart pe agar koi employee aapka call nahi uthata hai miss kar deta hai to mere paas sir kya hai mere level pe bahut sari company hai to number nahi reh pata sir. To ho sakta hai ki aapke miss call aaye ho mujhe nahi dhyan pada ho main nahi back call back kar paya. To sir aapko ek feedback jayega mere naam ka aapke mail pe. Usko sir aap yes kar dijiyega thik hai taki koi issue na ho. Sir iske liye sir aapko kal baat karu hai na.
Customer: Thik hai ji thik hai.
Executive: Kal call karu na sir aap bata rahe hai.
Customer: Ha ha sahi.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a missed call.

- Customer wants to renew subscription.

- Customer complains about frequent manager changes.

- Customer wants to know competitor strategies.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed renewal and service details.

- Executive offered to discuss competitor strategies.

- Executive will schedule a meeting with manager.

- Executive requested positive feedback on mail.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, subscription, competitor, feedback, manager
